blog.title: Pitchrs & Poets
blog.name: pitchersandpoets
blog.description: Baseball & Cultural Ephemera compiled in the tradition of Hiroshi Arakawa, Fernando Valenzuela, and Lance Berkman. Brought to you by Pitchers & Poets. @pitchersnpoets.

posts.caption:
Pitchers & Poets Podcast 30: The Fan Cave is Not Infinite

Ted and Eric discuss the mysteries of the MLB Fan Cave, the weirdness of Fred Wilpon, the 1990s First Basemen Week hangover, the golem that is Michael Pineda, Grizzly Giambi, and more.
